display_long_description:
Battle Flag XR is a mixed reality paintball game, designed to be played together, in real life, in the same place.

Play with friends in a crazy atmosphere, where your living room, break room, or garage becomes an XR playground!
Everyone sees each other, talks to each other, and competes live, without a remote network: here, you experience the game as a group.

🎯 A game designed to be played together in mixed reality

Local XR multiplayer for up to 6 players (3v3) in the same location

1v1 mode is free to start

No need to be remote: here, you can move, run, laugh, and challenge each other in real life + mixed reality

🎮 Fun and crazy paintball weapons

Spinning bombs, flying paint bottles, stylish launchers

Every shot leaves a real trace in the real world thanks to the depth camera

🎭 Inflatable masks to collect

Unlock according to your exploits

Fun, cartoon, punk, animal, robot styles... there's something for everyone!

🧩 Integrated Map Editor

Place obstacles yourself in your room: inflatable cones, paintball walls, hiding places, etc.

Create your own arena for each game, directly in mixed reality

🌍 Amazing immersion

Thanks to the depth camera, objects are perfectly positioned in your decor

Paint impacts appear on your furniture, walls, and floor: it's real virtual paintball!

🏁 Objective: Capture the enemy flag!

Solo or in a team, take risks, create a diversion, aim accurately...
